languages.text: {n}Не отводя взгляда от камня, старик шепчет:{/n} "Скульптура еще не готова".
{n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Не отводя взгляда от камня, старик шепчет:{/n} "Скульптура еще не готова".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

languages.text: {n}老人低声开了口，目光一刻都没从石头上移开过。{/n}“雕像还没刻好。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人低声开了口，目光一刻都没从石头上移开过。{/n}“雕像还没刻好。”

languages.text: {n}El anciano susurra sin apartar la mirada de la piedra:{/n} «La escultura todavía no está lista».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano susurra sin apartar la mirada de la piedra:{/n} «La escultura todavía no está lista».

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam, gözlerini taştan ayırmadan fısıldıyor.{/n} "Heykel henüz tam olarak hazır değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı adam, gözlerini taştan ayırmadan fısıldıyor.{/n} "Heykel henüz tam olarak hazır değil."

languages.text: {n}老人は石から目を離すことなく囁く。{/n}「彫刻はまだきちんと準備ができていません」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は石から目を離すことなく囁く。{/n}「彫刻はまだきちんと準備ができていません」

languages.text: {n}Sans quitter la pierre des yeux, le vieil homme murmure :{/n} « La sculpture n'est pas encore tout à fait prête. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans quitter la pierre des yeux, le vieil homme murmure :{/n} « La sculpture n'est pas encore tout à fait prête. »

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann flüstert, ohne den Stein aus den Augen zu lassen:{/n} "Die Skulptur ist noch nicht ganz fertig."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man whispers without taking his eyes off the stone,{/n} "The sculpture is not quite ready yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann flüstert, ohne den Stein aus den Augen zu lassen:{/n} "Die Skulptur ist noch nicht ganz fertig."
